text: @SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer The Coronavirus is the perfect example on how the Establishment prioritizes profit over health. They'll condemn and fear monger medical socialism until the economy becomes at risk, then it's free healthcare and talks of federally covered sick days. #EatTheRich #MedicareForAll
